comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Recent pictures are at www.devonguide.com/photos/img255.htm and www.devon-online.com/towns/brixham/Welcome.html A replica of Francis Drake's Golden Hind is now in the harbour.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: There are still trawlers in Brixham, but they look a bit different and moor in an artificial harbour built outside the old one. www.flickr.com/photos/taffytank/3452222431/
